div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 14:15 pm CDT

div.div: Sunny, with a high near 64. Northeast wind 10 to 15 mph.

A slight chance of showers before 1am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 1am and 4am, then a chance of showers after 4am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 39. East northeast wind around 5 mph becoming south southwest after midnight. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts of less than a tenth of an inch, except higher amounts possible in thunderstorms.
Sunny, with a high near 68. West southwest wind 5 to 15 mph becoming northwest in the morning. Winds could gust as high as 25 mph.
